page.title: 04 ******EMPLOYMENT******
page.content:
A recent survey,conducted by our village school-children,highlighted that the majority of employed people in the village; travel to their place of work,in nearby towns or villages, each day.Only 2% of those interviewed worked in Willington itself.
The breakdown of the employment survey of 256 adults is as follows:-
Housewives 79 Engineers 58 Reporters 3 Domestic Services 15 Draughtsmen 3 Manual Workers 20 Farm Workers 1 Teacher/Lecturer 21 Power Workers 6 Computer Technologist 4 Office Worker22 Health Workers 14 Unemployed 5 Public Services 5 Shopkeeper 2 Factory Worker 3
